content:
FedEx Developer Portal will experience interruption from 07/13/2024, 9:00 PM CT - 07/14/2024, 2:00 AM CT.
We apologize for any inconvenience such as slow response or technical difficulties. Thank you for your patience!

Leverage the FedEx OAuth 2.0 token authentication method to authorize the application and authenticate API requests.

Get rate estimates, process shipments and manage pickups for FedEx Freight® LTL shipments.

Global Trade API

Get regulatory documents and advisories for your shipments.

Ground End of Day Close API

Reconcile shipping information for your FedEx Ground® shipments and print various reports.

API

Create and enter information for a shipment as it is received throughout the day.

Manage everything related to courier shipment pickups.

Postal Code Validation API

Validate postal codes along with city, country and Origin-Destinations lookups.

Rates and Transit Times API

Request pre-ship rating information to determine costs.

API
Service Availability API

Determine the FedEx® service type, delivery date and transit time between an origin and destination.

API

Process and submit shipping requests to produce a shipping label.

API
Track API

Use FedEx® Tracking options to obtain timely and accurate tracking information.

Trade Documents Upload API

Electronically submit your trade documentation without printing to optimize the customs clearance process.

Subscribe to get near real-time tracking updates.
Subscribers are charged a monthly fee, based on count of track numbers
